stimulusHtml: Which of the following is a visual characteristic of Travelers among Mountains and Streams that contributes to the illusion of deep space?

features.html:
© Fan Kuan/Corbis
© The Chambers Gallery, London/The Bridgeman Art Library

choicesHtml: The use of only black and its tints instead of a range of colors
The overlapping forms of the foreground, middle ground, and background
The strong horizontal division created by the roadway near the bottom of the work
The rhythm created by the lines that indicate the rock formations of the mountains
